channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: IHG's exclusive app cyber sale: Get 25% off stays through March
item.description: Book by Nov. 19 to get 25% off IHG stays through March.

item.title: Last-minute strategies for earning World of Hyatt status
item.description: Want to earn Hyatt elite status? Here are some strategies you can jump on now to get to the next World of Hyatt status before the end of the year.

item.title: United elite status vs. United cardholder perks: What gets you more?
item.description: Trying to decide between United status and a United card? We break down the similarities and differences, and how to get the most out of both.

item.title: A normal Thanksgiving? Mass flight cancellations end as holiday rush nears
item.description: Thanksgiving travel is almost here, and flights are getting mostly back to normal. On Monday, the Federal Aviation Administration ended cancellation r...

item.title: How my Costco Anywhere Visa Card by Citi is a workhorse when it comes to cash back
item.description: The Costco Anywhere Visa is a solid multipurpose card that works overtime to earn cash back. Here's why I recommend it as a great catch-all option.
